components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incident_updates.body: Twilio REST API services: Gateway API-Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes are now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue investigating errors for Twilio Rest API, impacting following Twilio services: Gateway API-Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently investigating errors for Twilio Rest API, impacting following Twilio services: Gateway API-Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes. Our engineering team is actively working on the issue, and we will provide another update as soon as more information becomes available.
Twilio Serverless is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently investigating brief spike in HTTP 500 errors for Twilio Serverless when invoking Twilio Function. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
We've become aware of a potential issue with Twilio Serverless. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
We've become aware of a potential issue with Twilio Serverless. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: T-Mobile US API Errors Impacting Account Security Services

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing issues with the T-Mobile US API which are impacting Account Security Services and causing Verify SNA down for T-Mobile apart from VERIFY tag. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing issues with the T-Mobile US API which are impacting Account Security Services and causing Verify SNA down for T-Mobile apart from VERIFY tag. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing issues with the T-Mobile US API which are impacting Account Security Services and causing Verify SNA down for T-Mobile apart from VERIFY tag. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing issues with the T-Mobile US API which are impacting Account Security Services and causing Verify SNA down for T-Mobile apart from VERIFY tag. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience issues with the T-Mobile US API which are impacting Account Security Services and causing Verify SNA down for T-Mobile apart from VERIFY tag. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience issues with the T-Mobile US API which are impacting Account Security Services and causing Verify SNA down for T-Mobile apart from VERIFY tag. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience issues with the T-Mobile US API which are impacting Account Security Services and causing Verify SNA down for T-Mobile apart from VERIFY tag. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience issues with the T-Mobile US API which are impacting Account Security Services and causing Verify SNA down for T-Mobile apart from VERIFY tag. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have started seeing recovery for issues with the T-Mobile US API which are impacting Account Security Services and causing Verify SNA down for T-Mobile apart from VERIFY tag. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have started seeing recovery for issues with the T-Mobile US API which are impacting Account Security Services and causing Verify SNA down for T-Mobile apart from VERIFY tag. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing issues with the T-Mobile US API which are impacting Account Security Services and causing Verify SNA down for T-Mobile apart from VERIFY tag. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing an issue with the T-Mobile US API, impacting Account Security Services, causing Verify SNA down for T-Mobile apart from VERIFY tag. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: MMS Delivery Delays to C-Spire Network in United States of America

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to C-Spire Network in United States of America. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Customers Unexpectedly Redirected to Twilio Login Page

incident_updates.body: We are still investigating a service interruption where customers may experience being unexpectedly redirected to the Twilio Console login page. This experience may impact new user signups as well as existing customers with established sessions within the Twilio Console. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still investigating a service interruption where customers may experience being unexpectedly redirected to the Twilio Console login page. This experience may impact new user signups as well as existing customers with established sessions within the Twilio Console. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still investigating a service interruption where customers may experience being unexpectedly redirected to the Twilio Console login page. This experience may impact new user signups as well as existing customers with established sessions within the Twilio Console. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still investigating a service interruption where customers may experience being unexpectedly redirected to the Twilio Console login page. This experience may impact new user signups as well as existing customers with established sessions within the Twilio Console. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating a service interruption where customers may experience being unexpectedly redirected to the Twilio Console login page. This experience may impact new user signups as well as existing customers with established sessions within the Twilio Console. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected potential Failures in Twilio sessions creation. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Customers Unable to Access New Account Creation and MFA Reset Pages in Console

incident_updates.body: We have identified the root cause of the issue preventing some customers from accessing pages within the Twilio Console to self-serve creation of additional accounts and reset their MFA enrollment. We are working with our vendor partner to resolve the issue. We recommend that any customer using Chrome as the browser to log-in retry using Edge as the browser. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have identified the root cause of the issue preventing some customers from accessing pages within the Twilio Console to self-serve creation of additional accounts and reset their MFA enrollment. We are working with our vendor partner to resolve the issue. We recommend that any customer using Chrome as the browser to log-in retry using Edge as the browser. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have identified the root cause of the issue preventing some customers from accessing pages within the Twilio Console to self-serve creation of additional accounts and reset their MFA enrollment. We are working with our vendor partner to resolve the issue. We recommend that any customer using Chrome as the browser to log-in retry using Edge as the browser. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still investigating an issue preventing some customers from accessing pages within the Twilio Console to self-serve creation of additional accounts and reset their MFA enrollment. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating an issue preventing some customers from accessing pages within the Twilio Console to self-serve creation of additional accounts and reset their MFA enrollment. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with additional account creation. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

Our Voice carrier partner in Romania is conducting an emergency maintenance from 17 January 2025 at 14:00 PST until 17 January 2025 at 14:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from and to Twilio Romania phone numbers.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance on Saturday, Jan 18th, 2025, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 13 hours. Maintenance is planned as no-downtime, but  there can be intermittent failures on loading Insights Historical Dashboards and ETLs uploads while the maintenance is in progress.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 January 2025 at 13:00 PST until 20 January 2025 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone

Our carrier partner Vodafone United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 January 2025 at 16:00 PST until 20 January 2025 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Product: Verify Silent Network Auth

14 January 2025 at 12:00 PST until 21 January 2025 at 00:00 PST
